urls.title: Plan Your Next Weekend Trip
urls.description: Book By: 11:59 PM EDT on October 15, 2022 Thank goodness it’s Friday! Start planning a weekend getaway with fares from $39* one way. Not a Saver$ Club member? Join the club to get these savings today! Get all current deals and offers directly in your email inbox. Sign up now! Get points for every dollar spent on fares and À La Smarte options. Become a Free Spirit ® member today and start earning now. * All fares must be booked on spirit.com by 11:59 PM EDT on October 15, 2022, for travel on the dates as
